content: rae s lace by julie peng yellowcayenne rae s lace i designed this lace blanket to welcome the birth of a new family member all aspect of the blanket -- the lace pattern the color choice and the material -- used in this blanket were kept very clean and classic with the timelessness of the design rae s lace could be kept as an heirloom passing on to the next baby in the family yarn circulo anne 100% mercerized brazilian virgin cotton 147 g | 547 y 2 skeins in off-white needles us 7 4 5 mm 40 in 100 cm circular needles or size to obtain gauge notions tapestry needle 2 sets of 2 distinctive markers for separating the borders and the edges 18 markers to separate each pattern repeat in the main body gauge each diamond measures 1 25 3 2 cm wide and 1 25 3 2 cm long size one size finished measurements 35 in 89 cm square before blocking notes markers are optional but highly recommended to help keep tab of the st count and to separate the different sections of the blanket the first st of every row is slipped and it is done by slipping the st purl- wise with yarn in back revised august 2025 ©2022 julie peng p 2 abbreviations bm - border marker bobble - bind off co - cast on em - edge marker k - knit k2tog - knit 2 sts together 1 st decrease m - marker mm - main marker p - purl skp slip 1 knit 1 pass slipped stitch over - sl1 st knit-wise k the next st then pass the slipped st over the k st and off of the needle sk2p slip 1 knit 2 together pass slipped stitch over - sl1 st knit-wise k2tog then pass the slipped st over the k2tog st and off of the needle sl- slip st s - stitch es yo - yarn over video reference link https //www tinyurl com/raeslace ©2022 julie peng p 3 border co 181 sts using the long-tail co method sl1 k to end of row turn repeat this row until border measures 2 in 5 cm from co edge set-up row sl1 k9 place bm1 k2 place em1 k8 place mm 18x k8 place em2 k7 place bm2 k10 turn body row 1 sl1 k9 sl bm1 k2tog yo sl em1 k1 yo skp yo 2x sk2p yo sl mm to em2 sl em2 k1 yo skp 3x sl bm2 k10 turn row 2 and all even row to row 12 sl1 k9 sl bm p to next bm slipping all m s as they appear k10 turn row 3 sl1 k9 sl bm1 k2 sl em1 yo skp row 11 sl1 k9 sl bm1 k1 k2tog sl em1 3x k2 sl mm to em2 sl em2 yo skp 3x yo k1 yo skp 2x k1 k2tog sl mm to k1 sl bm2 k10 turn em2 sl em2 yo k1
